data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Panch Mahals, Gujarat, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,364,501 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Panch Mahals, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Panch Mahals, Gujarat, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Panch Mahals, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Panch Mahals, Gujarat, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Valmiki, Balmiki (Hindu traditions) people.
Lord, to the people of Panch Mahals you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 26,299 believers in Panch Mahals.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Panch Mahals to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

location.name: Panch Mahals
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Tapodhan, Katpitia, Shenva (Hindu traditions), Behlim, Nadia
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Brahmin Tapodhan (30,000), Katpitia (100), Shenva (Hindu traditions) (118,000), Behlim (8,200), Nadia (54,000)
